column1: # Results of scaling experiments executed with run_scaling_experiments.sh
# Wall clock running time including provisioning+bootstrap is the "Elapsed time" from the EMR console.
# Wall clock running time excluding provisioning+bootstrap is the
# Cost per sample excluding DynamoDB charges is computed by rounding up 3rd column to the nearest # hours and charging ($0.11/instance/hr (that is, the spot price) + $0.105/instance/hr).
# Note that the first column is off by 1 from the number of instances reserved; there's always one additional master instance.

column3: wall clock running time (min; including provisioning and bootstrap)
column4: wall clock running time (min; excluding provisioning and bootstrap)
column5: cost per sample (estimated; excluding DynamoDB charges)
